class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 16 - August 10, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu.
course_description: This is the second of the two elementary Chinese courses, offered only in Emory's summer study abroad program in China. It is designed for those who have taken CHN 101 or CHN 111. The course aims to further develop communicative skills in speaking, listening, reading, and writing in Chinese.
sections: Class Nbr: 1421, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: H. Li, Status: Open
